actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill authorizing the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers to make studies in cooperation with the governments of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands and the Commonwealth of the Northern  Mariana Islands for the purpose of providing plans for the development, utilization, and conservation of water and related land resources of such Territory and Commonwealth, and for other purposes.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to study, in cooperation with the governments of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands and the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands, water development, utilization, and conservation plans for such areas.

titles.title: A bill authorizing the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers to make studies in cooperation with the governments of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands and the Commonwealth of the Northern  Mariana Islands for the purpose of providing plans for the development, utilization, and conservation of water and related land resources of such Territory and Commonwealth, and for other purposes.
